description: This file defines a React component for an 'Add Listing' page in a marketplace app, allowing users to submit new pigeon listings with various attributes.

methods.name: AddListing()
methods.description: React functional component to render a form for adding a new pigeon listing, managing form state and submission.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates the form state for a given key with a new value.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission: prevents default, sets saving state, calls API, and navigates upon success.
